sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './DetailInfo.scss' import Button from '../Button' export default function DetailInfo({item}) { const [count, setCount] = useState(1) const plusCount = () =>{ setCount(count+1) } const minus = ()=>{ if(count){ setCount(count-1) return count=2 } } return (

{item.title}

{item.description}

{item.price*count}$

{count}
) }
